vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.13.22;
son of: Anak (H6061);
brother of: Ahiman (H0289) and Sheshai (H8344)
§ Talmai = "furrowed"
1) one of the 3 sons of the giant Anak who were slain by the men of Judah
2) son of Ammihud, king of Geshur, later king of Geshur himself, and father of Maacah, the mother of Absalom and wife of David
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   gigante; descendiente de Anac; (b)   rey de Guesur
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
撻買 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "犁溝"
1) 巨人亞衲的三個兒子之一
2) 基述王亞米忽之子, 他是基述末期的國王, 瑪迦的父親, 瑪迦是押沙龍的母親及大衛的妻子
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
挞买 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "犁沟"
1) 巨人亚衲的三个儿子之一
2) 基述王亚米忽之子, 他是基述末期的国王, 玛迦的父亲, 玛迦是押沙龙的母亲及大卫的妻子

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.3.3;
son of: Ammihud (H5989J);
father of: Maacah (H4601I)
§ Talmai = "furrowed"
1) one of the 3 sons of the giant Anak who were slain by the men of Judah
2) son of Ammihud, king of Geshur, later king of Geshur himself, and father of Maacah, the mother of Absalom and wife of David
